title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Apr 28 2022
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Apr 28 2022
description:
The economy shrunk 1.4% in Q1 of 2022. Lisa Boothe talks about her new podcast- "The Truth with Lisa Boothe" - and DHS Secretary Mayorkas's new disinformation panel. Matt Walsh talks about Amazon employees horror at the company selling Matt's book "Johnny the Walrus.” Dr. Marty Makary on Dr. Fauci saying that we're out of the pandemic phase - and Moderna wanting authorization to vaccinate kids 6 months to 5 years old.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
